column2: case1902_glm <- glm(Death/(Death + NoDeath) ~ Victim + Aggravation, family = binomial,

glm(formula = Death/(Death + NoDeath) ~ Victim + Aggravation, 
    family = binomial, data = case1902, weights = (Death + NoDeath))
Null deviance: 212.2838  on 11  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance:   3.8816  on  9  degrees of freedom
ggplot(case1902_aug, aes(x = Aggravation, y = log((Death + .5)/(prop - Death + .5)))) +
